headline: Amazon.com (AMZN) And Saks Unveil AI-Driven Customer Experiences Through AWS Collaboration
summary: On August 8, 2025, NLX announced a collaboration with Saks Fifth Avenue and AWS, aimed at enhancing customer interactions through AI-powered experiences, which may have contributed to Amazon.com (AMZN)'s stock price increasing by 15% last quarter. This partnership, leveraging NLX Voice+ and Amazon Connect, aims to improve service efficiency and customer satisfaction, and represents a notable advancement in the company's offerings. The period also saw the broader technology sector and the...
